title: Naming Rights in IETF Protocols
abstract:
This document proposes a new revenue source for the IETF to support
standardization activities: protocol field naming rights, i.e., the association
of commercial brands with protocol fields.  This memo describes a process for
assignment of rights and explores some of the issues associated with the
process.  Individuals or organizations that wish to purchase naming rights for
one or more protocol fields are expected to follow this process.  This memo provides information for the Internet community.
